name: An Update Is Pending Demo
description:
CONTROLS

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Z - Select
  • X - Back
  • E - Use Item

Mario Bros Classic meets RPG completionism

An arcade-style platformer where players begin with MS-DOS graphics and minimalistic UIs and must balance between "upgrading" the game by buying the final boss, better graphics, sound effects etc, or trying to improve their chances of succeeding their current run by buying extra lives, corruption-resistant headgear etc using bits dropped by defeating enemies.
